name: Late For Work
description: Play as a giant gorilla in VR and face off against your puny human friends in the ultimate couch party game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift with motion controllers required for VR play. Gamepad required for 2+ non-vr players  - keyboard+mouse also supported.
